testcase.name: Verify user can navigate to Order History page
testcase.system-out: Given the user is authenticated.............................................passed When the user navigates to Order History page...............................passed Then the user should see the Order History page.............................passed And the Order History page should display orders............................passed

testcase.name: Verify user can open order details
testcase.system-out: Given the user is authenticated.............................................passed When the user navigates to Order History page...............................passed And the user opens the first order details..................................passed Then the order details should be displayed..................................passed

testcase.name: Verify navigation menu functionality
testcase.system-out: Given the user is authenticated.............................................passed When the user clicks on the Orders menu item................................passed Then the user should be redirected to the Orders page.......................passed When the user clicks on the Special Orders menu item........................passed Then the user should be redirected to the Special Orders page...............passed When the user clicks on the FAQs menu item..................................passed Then the user should be redirected to the FAQs page.........................passed
